articles.title: How to get the new Nike Air Max SNDR Black and Photo Blue shoes for $190
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Nike is re-launching its Air Max SNDR sneaker, featuring reflective panels, zipper closures, and Max Air cushioning units. The Air Max SNDR Black and Photo Blue shoe will be available for $190 starting June 5th. The shoe has a mix of black, Photo Blue and Court Blue.

articles.title: Slideshow: Food, beverage innovation goes functional
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Companies are introducing new products formulated for increased energy. These products also feature formulations for increased protein and improved immune health.

articles.title: You Still Have Time to Buy Your Dad a Gift
articles.author: Chinea Rodriguez
articles.summary: The article suggests gift ideas for Father's Day, highlighting products like the Joyce Chen Kitchen Scissors for versatile use, the Canon Ivy 2 Mini Photo Printer for physical photo keepsakes, the Courant Mag:2 Wireless Charging Stand for convenient device charging, and Graza Drizzle Olive Oil to enhance meals.

articles.title: Dyson just slashed the price of popular V8 Absolute cordless vacuum
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $170 discount on the V8 Absolute cordless vacuum as part of its Father's Day Deals sales event. The V8 Absolute features two cleaner heads for different floor types and a fully sealed filtration system that captures 99.99% of microscopic particles.

articles.title: Samsung Vs. LG: Which TV Brand Is Best?
articles.author: Rebecca Isaacs
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the S95F featuring an upgraded N4Q AI Gen 3 processor and Live Translate, a Samsung Vision AI software, along with the rest of Samsung's 2025 lineup, including the Samsung QN90F and the Samsung QN990F 8K TV. LG introduced the G5 TV with a new Alpha 11 AI Processor Gen2 with features like AI Picture Pro and AI Super Upscaling. Both brands also offer different gaming hubs.

articles.title: Walmart 'Road to Open Call' Offers Locals a Shot at Store Shelves
articles.author: Site Staff
articles.summary: Walmart is hosting a Road to Open Call event in New Orleans, offering small businesses a chance to pitch their made-in-the-USA products to Walmart's sourcing team. This event aims to connect entrepreneurs with Walmart and potentially lead to their products being sold on Walmart or Sam's Club shelves.

articles.title: Jumia marks 13 years of e-Commerce impact in Nigeria
articles.author: Blessing Anaro
articles.summary: Jumia is launching the 2025 Anniversary Campaign from June 2 to June 22, featuring deals from brands like Nivea, Xiaomi, and others. Nivea will highlight its new NIVEA SUNSCREEN – UV Face, re-launched Deep Maxx Tech Body Lotion, and Radiant & Beauty Even Glow during the campaign, also offering exclusive discounts.

articles.title: 2026 Nissan Leaf revealed in more detail
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Nissan is preparing to launch its third-generation Leaf on June 18. The new Leaf will feature an SUV-like design.

articles.title: 2026 Nissan Leaf EV revealed in more detail
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Nissan revealed details about its third-generation Leaf. The Leaf is adopting an SUV-like design.

articles.title: See New York at night with these $89.99 night vision binoculars
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: StackCommerce partner is offering mini digital night vision binoculars for $89.99. These binoculars feature 1080P FHD video and photo capabilities, infrared night vision, 10X optical magnification, and adjustable brightness levels for enhanced visibility in various conditions and environments.

articles.title: Here's How to Choose the Best Sunscreen for Your Face, According to Experts
articles.author: Jannely Espinal
articles.summary: Naked Sundays created a clear sunscreen called Radiant Sun Serum that acts as a serum, moisturizer, and primer. Kopari offers a body mist sunscreen with gold sparkles for easy reapplication. Shiseido offers sunscreens like Ultimate Sun Protector Cream with 'HeatForce' and 'WetForce' technology, and another anti-aging formula suitable for darker skin tones. EltaMD has UV Clear Broad Spectrum sunscreen with niacinamide, while Neutrogena provides a lightweight, non-greasy sunscreen. Sun Bum offers a lotion with a signature summer scent, and Avène features an ultra-lightweight formula for those prone to redness.

articles.title: Switch 2 games: The full launch lineup for the Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: Nick Schwartz
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Switch 2 on June 5th, 2025, with Mario Kart World as a key title. A bundle including Mario Kart World will be available for $499, while the Nintendo Switch 2 console alone costs $449. Several Switch 1 games will receive free upgrades for the Switch 2.

articles.title: Alphabet Archives
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google launched AI Edge Gallery, a new app designed to enable users to run openly available AI models directly on their Android phones. This platform utilizes local processing, eliminating the need for a constant internet connection.

articles.title: Samsung drops a slick teaser for its all new 'Ultra' foldable
articles.author: Nandika Ravi
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new "Ultra" model foldable phone, potentially as a rebrand of the Galaxy Z Fold 7 or in addition to it. The device will feature a smaller, more portable form factor, Galaxy AI integration, and AI-powered tools for messaging, browsing, and gaming. It will also offer enhanced multitasking capabilities when unfolded, acting as an entertainment hub or spacious workspace. The new model is expected to debut with the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and the Galaxy Z Fold 7.

articles.title: Samsung phones are getting a weird AI shopping platform nobody asked for
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Glance AI, owned by InMobi, is launching its e-commerce platform on Samsung Galaxy phones in the US through the Samsung Galaxy Store. The platform features a generative AI shopping experience, including a lock screen component and a feature that uses AI to create images of users wearing different outfits. This feature will be available on Samsung Galaxy S22, S23, S24, and S25 series phones.

articles.title: Samsung teams up with Glance to use your face in AI-generated lock screen ads
articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.summary: Glance and Samsung are launching a new "AI shopping" experience. This feature uses a selfie to generate custom fashion ads and will be available on numerous Samsung phones soon. Glance is leveraging AI technology to enhance its lock screen advertising capabilities.

articles.title: New Nintendo Switch 2 bundles can be paid for in instalments
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching new Nintendo Switch 2 bundles. These bundles will soon be available for purchase.

articles.title: Aldi to open its second Staten Island location later this month
articles.author: Jessica Jones-Gorman
articles.summary: Aldi is opening a new store in New Dorp, Staten Island on June 26. This location will be one of 30 in New York to offer beer, cider, and ready-to-drink adult beverages. The store will carry sangria, margaritas, radlers and hard seltzers priced at $15 or less.

articles.title: Bugaboo Butterfly 2 Review
articles.author: Crystal Ro
articles.summary: Bugaboo has launched the Bugaboo Butterfly 2 stroller, retailing for $599.00, with improvements over the original version, including a nearly-full recline, a pocket in the back, and a peep window on the sun shade. The Bugaboo Butterfly 2 is designed to be lightweight and compact, aimed at being a top-of-the-line travel stroller.

articles.title: The New Fan-Favorite Energy Drink Flavor Taking Over the Internet Has Arrived at Walmart
articles.author: Nathan Hutsenpiller
articles.summary: Alani Nu has launched a new Cotton Candy flavor of its energy drink at Walmart. The 12-ounce cans are available for $2.48 each and contains zero-sugar, antioxidant-rich energy drink delivers bold flavor, low calories, ginseng root extract, and a hefty 200mg of caffeine. The new flavor is vegan, gluten-free, and contains no artificial colors.

articles.title: 10 Best Exfoliating Body Washes for Super Smooth Skin
articles.author: Conçetta Ciarlo
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of various exfoliating body washes from companies like Naturium ('The Smoother Glycolic Acid Exfoliating Body Wash'), Nécessaire ('The Body Wash Hinoki'), CeraVe ('Body Wash with Salicylic Acid'), Sidia ('The Body Exfoliant'), Soft Services ('Exfoliating Bar'), Cetaphil ('Acne Relief Body Wash'), Kosas ('Good Body Skin'), Medicube ('Red Body Wash'), First Aid Beauty ('KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub'), and Oui the People ('Clean Slate Lactic Acid Body Wash'). Each product is described with its key ingredients, benefits, and specific focus (e.g., acne-prone skin, sensitive skin, ingrown hairs).

articles.title: Why are Talenti gelato jars so hard to open?
articles.author: Jonathan Lamour
articles.summary: Talenti is addressing customer complaints regarding the difficulty of opening their ice cream jars. As a short-term fix, Talenti is rolling out a new lid. Talenti also offered the "Talenti Twist", a branded jar gripper, and is actively working on a long-term solution to improve jar accessibility.

articles.title: Why are Talenti gelato jars so hard to open?
articles.author: Jonathan Lamour
articles.summary: Talenti is introducing a new lid for its ice cream jars as a short-term solution to address customer complaints about the difficulty of opening them.  The company is also developing a long-term packaging solution to improve ease of use while maintaining the jar's signature design.  They also gave away Talenti Twists to help open jars, however it's no longer available.

articles.title: Why are Talenti gelato jars so hard to open? The brand is working on a fix
articles.author: Jonathan Lamour
articles.summary: Talenti is introducing a new, easier-to-open lid as a short-term solution to address customer complaints about their difficult-to-open ice cream jars. They are also working on a long-term packaging solution to improve ease of use while preserving the jar's signature look. Additionally, Talenti gave away a branded jar gripper called the Talenti Twist.

articles.title: Why are Talenti gelato jars so hard to open? – NBC 5 Dallas-Fort Worth
articles.author: Jonathan Lamour
articles.summary: Talenti is addressing customer complaints about the difficulty in opening its ice cream jars by rolling out a new, easier-to-open lid as a short-term fix. The company also has a team working on a long-term packaging solution that maintains the transparent jar design while significantly improving ease of use.

articles.title: Poppi Changed This 1 Flavor's Recipe Following Customer Complaints
articles.author: Joseph Lamour
articles.summary: Poppi has relaunched its Root Beer flavor with a new formula and refreshed look due to customer feedback. The updated Root Beer still contains apple cider vinegar, prebiotics, and 5 grams of sugar, but now features a 'bold, refreshed flavor' and includes cassava root fiber. Early reviews indicate significant improvements over the previous version.

articles.title: Samsung teased the existence of a higher-end Galaxy Z Fold Ultra
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its next-generation book-style foldable smartphone, expected to be named Galaxy Z Fold 6 Ultra. This new phone will integrate high-end Ultra branding with the existing foldable line, incorporating Galaxy AI features optimized for the foldable format. The launch is anticipated later this year, with rumors suggesting a slimmer design.

articles.title: Nutella just announced its 1st new flavor in over 60 years. Not everyone's excited about it.
articles.author: Kaitlin Reilly
articles.summary: Ferrero is launching a new Nutella flavor called Nutella Peanut in spring 2026. The new product blends the creaminess of Nutella cocoa hazelnut spread with the taste of roasted peanuts, and it is dairy-free. The release marks Nutella's first new flavor since 1964.

articles.title: 'Dirty Soda": Is it worth trying the viral TikTok drink?
articles.summary: Swig, a Utah-based drive-thru soda shop, has recently opened a new location in Indian Land, SC, and is expanding to Rock Hill, SC, due to early success. The shop is known for its 'dirty sodas,' which are customizable beverages featuring sodas like Coca-Cola and Mountain Dew, mixed with cream-based sweeteners and fruit flavors.

articles.title: Fans say popular frozen treat is impossible to open. Here's what the company is doing about it.
articles.author: Molly Walsh
articles.summary: Talenti is addressing customer complaints about the difficulty of opening their gelato jars. The company is testing a new lid as a short-term fix and has a team working on a long-term solution to improve jar usability while maintaining its signature appearance. These efforts represent an update to their product packaging.

articles.title: 13 best Father's Day gifts for the dad who 'doesn't want anything'
articles.author: Ashley Morris
articles.summary: The article showcases Father's Day gift ideas including Aeropress travel coffee kit, Callaway personalized golf balls, Jack Black lip care set, Uniqlo socks, Carhartt t-shirts, Crocs clogs, the new Apple iPad model with a faster A16 processing chip, Garmin Forerunner 165 smartwatch, Solo Stove smokeless fire pit, Onyx Boox Palma 2 e-reader, and the Beast blender. These items from brands are suitable for dads with hobbies in outdoors, sports, skincare, fashion, fitness, or cooking.

articles.title: high-tech Archives
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: AliExpress is promoting the Samsung Galaxy A15 smartphone, which was released in February. Over 350 customers have rated the smartphone 4.8.

articles.title: Wyze ‘Bulb Cam' combines lightbulb and camera for new smart-home security option
articles.author: Kurt Schlosser
articles.summary: Wyze has launched the Wyze Bulb Cam, a two-in-one lightbulb and security camera priced at $49.98. The device includes an 800 lumen LED bulb, a 2K HD camera with a 160-degree field of vision, and two-way audio, controllable through the Wyze App. Wyze is also offering accessory bulbs for $16.98 that can pair with the Bulb Cam.

articles.title: Where to buy Nintendo Switch 2 on UK launch day – stock tips and pricing
articles.author: Freelance Journalist
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5th. While some retailers have paused or cancelled pre-orders, Nintendo itself is offering pre-orders for the console priced at £395 or bundled with Mario Kart World for £429.99 with a Nintendo Online subscription. Nintendo anticipates selling 15 million units in the first year and expects low stock in Japan, USA and in the UK.

articles.title: Bing Video Creator gives you ChatGPT's AI video generation, for free
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Microsoft launched Bing Video Creator, a new video generation service, available through the Bing mobile application. Users can generate short 5-second videos for free, with options for paid credits or longer wait times for additional creations.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 launch live - Stock alerts, midnight launches, guides and impressions
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2, the successor to the original Nintendo Switch, is launching on June 5. It features an upgraded screen, improved frame rates, and enhanced JoyCon controller functionality. The launch is accompanied by new games, including Mario Kart World and Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour.

articles.title: Where to buy the Nintendo Switch 2: Stock updates as console launches
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Switch 2 on June 5th, with retailers like Argos and EE offering the console. EE is offering Switch 2 bundles and Sony has kicked off its Days of Play sale including the PS5 Pro available on Amazon.

articles.title: I was amazed by the Motorola Edge 60 Pro's epic battery life – and you will be too
articles.summary: The Motorola Edge 60 Pro is a new mid-range smartphone featuring a 6.7in OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme CPU, and a 6000mAh battery with 90W wired charging. It also includes a 50MP main camera, 10MP telephoto lens, and a 50MP ultrawide lens.

articles.title: How to watch new Bravo series 'Next Gen NYC' for free: Cast, streaming
articles.author: Angela Tricarico
articles.summary: Bravo is launching a new TV series, 'Next Gen NYC,' on June 3rd. The show will air every Tuesday at 9 p.m. ET and will also be available on streaming platforms like DIRECTV and fuboTV.

articles.title: Smart AI gadgets for home that actually make life easier
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Roborock and Roomba offer robot vacuums with advanced mapping and cleaning capabilities. Qubo, Imou, and Arlo provide AI cameras that distinguish between people, pets, and cars for tailored alerts. Cubo AI and Nanit have developed baby monitors that track sleep and breathing patterns, alerting users to unsafe positions, while Google Nest Hub Max uses facial recognition to display personalized information.

articles.title: Google delays rollout of its 'Ask Photos' AI search feature
articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.summary: Google is delaying the rollout of its "Ask Photos" feature for about two weeks due to latency, quality, and user experience issues. "Ask Photos" leverages Google's Gemini AI model to enable users to search their Google Photos libraries using natural language prompts.

articles.title: Google delays rollout of its 'Ask Photos' AI search feature
articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.summary: Google is delaying the rollout of its "Ask Photos" feature by approximately two weeks due to latency, quality, and user experience issues. The feature, powered by Google's Gemini AI model, allows users to search their Google Photos libraries using natural language prompts. A revised version aiming to correct these issues will be shipped.

articles.title: Nespresso's top-rated espresso machine is almost half off right now — its lowest price ever
articles.author: Cory Fernandez
articles.summary: Nespresso's Vertuo Next espresso machine is currently offered at its lowest price. This compact, single-serve appliance includes a milk frother and an assortment of Nespresso capsules.

articles.title: Samsung unveils new AI-powered TVs
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new lineup of AI-powered television models in the Philippines, including the Neo QLED Vision AI TV, Samsung OLED Vision AI TV, and Neo QLED 8K Vision AI TV. These TVs feature AI-powered features, AI Picture and Sound, and Universal Gesture, with the Neo QLED 8K powered by the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor. Customers who pre-order can get up to P65,000 off and enjoy sound device freebies until June 30.

articles.title: Best Laptop Deal of the Day: $300 Off an Inspiron 16 Plus Desktop Replacement
articles.author: Jade Chung-Lee
articles.summary: Dell is offering a discount on the Inspiron 16 Plus 7640 laptop, which features a 16-inch 2.5K display and an Intel Core Ultra 9 CPU. The Inspiron 16 Plus is targeted towards users seeking a utility laptop capable of handling daily computing tasks and boosting productivity.

articles.title: Tursian Skincare Ushers in a New Era in Skin Science with the Power of Three: Exosomes, Stem Cells, and Peptides
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Tursian Skincare officially launched a new skincare line blending exosomes, stem cells, and peptides with 322 active ingredients. The initial launch includes a 12-piece line-up, featuring products like R1 Radiance Booster Gel Cleanser, P2 Hydration Activator Energising Toner, P3 Ultimate Hydration Serum Concentrate, Y3 Youth Restore Serum Concentrate, and R31 Eye Contour Brightening Gel.

articles.title: ⁠I Tried the Drip Closet App for Four Months. Here's My Honest Review
articles.author: Israel Okunaya
articles.summary: Drip, a free iOS fashion and lifestyle app, combines wardrobe organization, outfit planning, and social styling. The app features AI that analyzes outfits, suggests similar items, and identifies purchasing locations, and it is useful for style inspiration and practical shopping.

articles.title: Nectar Mattress Review: A Good Value That's Comfortable And Supportive
articles.author: McKenzie Dillon
articles.summary: Nectar has redesigned its mattress lineup, including the Nectar Classic, which now features cooling fibers and an updated construction. The Nectar Classic Memory Foam mattress is suitable for back, stomach, and combination sleepers, while the Nectar Hybrid and Nectar Luxe models cater to those needing extra support or side sleepers. The new Nectar mattresses also no longer use fiberglass.

articles.title: LTTS partners with Tennant Company for advance sustainable cleaning technologies
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: L&T Technology Services (LTTS) and Tennant Company have formed a strategic agreement to accelerate the development of sustainable new products in the industrial cleaning sector. LTTS will establish an Offshore Development Center (ODC) in India to support Tennant's innovation efforts, focusing on product lifecycle management, IoT integration, and digital automation to enhance Tennant's ability to develop advanced cleaning solutions.

articles.title: Meet the next chapter of the Ultra experience
articles.author: Gazeta Express
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new Galaxy Ultra device with a foldable form factor, integrating advanced AI features specifically designed for this format. The device aims to combine art and technical excellence, providing an Ultra experience with top-of-the-line hardware and seamless AI integration.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Hair Products If You Hate Using Hot Tools
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: Kristin Ess launches a moisturizing shampoo with Zip-Up Technology, designed to seal split ends.  L'Oréal introduces Wonder Water, an 8-second hair treatment for detangling and adding shine.  SheaMoisture offers a curl-defining cream with coconut oil, silk protein, and neem oil for voluminous and defined curls.

articles.title: Next launches limited edition Father's Day Spoil Him Grooming Box for £22
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Next has launched The Fathers Day Spoil Him Grooming Box, a limited-edition bundle containing skincare, bodycare, and grooming essentials from brands like Aromatherapy Associates, Rituals, and Percy & Reed. The bundle, worth £88, retails for £22 and offers a range of products for dads to enjoy a pampering experience.

articles.title: Expensya Founders Return with Thunder Code, an AI Startup Backed by $9M in Seed Funding
articles.author: Sean Whitehead
articles.summary: Thunder Code, a generative AI-powered software testing platform, has launched after securing $9 million in seed funding. The platform automates software testing and is already in use across North America, Europe, and North Africa, focusing on web app testing initially with plans to expand into other areas by late 2025.

articles.title: I'm excited about the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra's possible new cameras, but what I want is an integrated S Pen
articles.author: Lance Ulanoff
articles.summary: Samsung plans to unveil a folding Galaxy Ultra, potentially named the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra. The new foldable might match the S25 Ultra camera specs and could incorporate the S Pen, although it currently lacks integrated S Pen support unlike the Galaxy S Ultra line. The integration of a special thin S Pen into the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra is suggested as a desirable innovation.

articles.title: 5 interesting products I reviewed in May 2025
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: Legion introduced the Slim 5 gaming laptop, noted for its thin design and strong performance. Black+Decker entered the Indian AC market with an energy-efficient and user-friendly unit. EMotorad launched the Doodle Pro electric bike, emphasizing its fun and sturdy design for city commutes. Lenovo released the ThinkPad T14s Gen 6 laptop, focusing on reliability and performance for work.

articles.title: Achieve glossy, salon-fresh style with 20% off the Dyson Supersonic hair dryer that leaves hair flawless: 'By far the best I've ever used'
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer, featuring specialty sensors, scalp protection mode, LED display indicating heat levels, and a memory function that learns styling preferences. The hair dryer also includes multiple styling attachments and is available in a special-edition Jasper Plum model with a 20 percent discount until June 8, 2025.

articles.title: What to know about the return of McDonald's Snack Wraps
articles.summary: McDonald's will launch a new version of the Snack Wrap on July 10.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Jun 4, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. Spritz Society has launched Lemon Iced Tea, WARHEADS introduced Atomic Fizz candy, Justin's launched Peanut Caramel Nougat Chocolate Candy Bars, Cheez-It introduced Frozen Pizzas, Always launched Pocket FlexFoam pads, Keebler released E.L. Fudge Choco Vanilla Cookies, Wonderful Pistachios launched No Shells Dill Pickle, M&M's introduced Peanut Butter & Jelly candies, Revolution Beauty launched Pout Lip Oil, and Her Florastor launched Digest + De-Stress Probiotics.

articles.title: Eden tries a product designed to keep your shoes on your feet
articles.summary: Heelzfirst, a strap designed to make high heels feel more secure, is being tested. The product aims to improve the wearing experience of high heels.

articles.title: Kroger customers get delicious news
articles.author: Nina Zdinjak
articles.summary: Kroger is promoting new ice cream flavors by giving away 92,000 pints of its limited Kroger Brand ice cream. Starting June 20th, customers can claim a digital coupon for a free pint of ice cream, redeemable at Kroger Family of Stores locations. The giveaway is a promotion for four new flavors: Italian Style Summer Fizz, Fireside Nights, Sandy Shores, and Poolside Tan Lines.

articles.title: Get the Shark Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum that ‘changed my life' at 40% off
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Amazon offers a 40% discount on the Shark Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum. The vacuum is a lightweight, versatile cleaning tool with an extra-large dust cup, headlights, and converts to a handheld unit. It includes attachments like a pet multi-tool and crevice tool.

articles.title: hello® brings "Everyday Yay" to daily routines across Canada with two new launches
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: hello® has launched two new products: dragon dazzle toothpaste and sunny daze 24-hour deodorant in Canada. The dragon dazzle toothpaste is designed for kids with a blue raspberry flavor and cavity protection, while the sunny daze deodorant is an aluminum-free deodorant with a citrus and vanilla scent. Both products are available online and in stores at retailers like Shoppers Drug Mart and Walmart.

articles.title: Samsung teases Galaxy Ultra series foldable phone
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new ultra-premium foldable phone called the Galaxy Ultra, featuring a slim design, curved corners, long battery life, immersive viewing experience, and AI-powered features. The company also plans to release the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Flip7 series. The launch is expected to take place in July, with more details to be revealed closer to the event.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 is here: all of the launch news
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2, featuring new games and updates to existing titles. Mario Kart World, designed as an open-world experience, is a key launch title. No Man's Sky is receiving a free update optimized for the Switch 2, enhancing resolution and framerate, while Pokémon Scarlet and Violet are also updated for the new console.

articles.title: Boats Group Debuts Internal AI Customer Support Agent to Deliver Faster, More Consistent Help for Dealers and YachtCloser Users
articles.author: Boats Group
articles.summary: Boats Group launched its new AI-powered Customer Support Agent on June 4, 2025. This tool is designed to provide faster and more consistent assistance to dealers, brokers, and OEMs across Boats Group's marketplaces, including YachtWorld, Boat Trader, boats.com, and YachtCloser.

articles.title: US celebrity-backed firm to debut cell-cultivated salmon at Oregon restaurants
articles.summary: Wildtype received FDA clearance to serve its cultured salmon products to consumers. The company produces sashimi and sushi-grade cultured salmon using cells from Pacific salmon, signaling the introduction of a new type of seafood product.

articles.title: Does Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra tease mean a cheaper foldable is also on the way?
articles.author: Tom Morgan-Freelander
articles.summary: Samsung is developing a new foldable phone, potentially called the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra, which may feature industry-leading hardware, cutting-edge performance, and AI integration optimized for the foldable format. The device is expected to be larger than its predecessor, addressing competition in terms of dimensions and battery capacity. Samsung might also introduce a more affordable Fan Edition variant later, similar to the rumored Galaxy Z Flip SE.

articles.title: Fashion fans praise New Look's £27 'bloat-friendly' jeans alternative 'perfect for summer'
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: New Look has introduced light blue drawstring waist denim trousers priced at £26.99, designed as a comfortable and stylish alternative to jeans for the summer. Available in sizes 6-18, the trousers feature a wide leg design and adjustable waistband, receiving positive customer reviews for their lightweight feel and suitability for warm weather.

articles.title: Makeup lovers say 'seamless' foundation is 'irreplaceable' in their routine
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Chantecaille introduces Future Skin Foundation, a water-based gel foundation, offering lightweight, complete coverage with botanicals like aloe and green tea for soothing and protecting skin. Sculpted By Aimee offers Hydratint, a tinted serum that nourishes and protects skin while adding sheer veil of color.

articles.title: Snapchat's New Game Development Tools
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Snapchat introduced new game development tools. These tools aim to enhance the platform's gaming capabilities.

articles.title: Stanton Optical Expands Reach with New Store in North Little Rock, AR
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Stanton Optical is celebrating the grand opening ceremony of its North Little Rock store. Stanton Optical aims to make eye care easy, accessible, and affordable for all.

articles.title: ValGenesis Launches Smart GxP™ as First AI-Enabled Platform to Unify Validation and Process Development
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ValGenesis launched ValGenesis Smart GxP, an AI-enabled platform, on June 4, 2025. This platform unifies validation and process lifecycle management across the life sciences industry by digitally connecting all stages of the product lifecycle, streamlining tech transfer, and accelerating time to market.

articles.title: From skincare bundles to beard balms, we've found the affordable Father's Day grooming gifts he'll actually use (plus £5 off when you spend £30)
articles.author: LYDIA WHEATLEY
articles.summary: Bulldog Skincare has launched its Father's Day gifting range, featuring bundles like the Age Defence Skincare Routine Bundle and Original Beard Care Kit, as well as individual products such as the Original Beard Balm and Anytime Daily UV Moisturiser SPF 50. The range includes items designed for various skin types and grooming needs, with special offers available for customers who spend over £30.

articles.title: IAB Tech Lab Addresses AI's Impact on Web Economics and Brand Reputation; Proposes Large Language Model (LLM) Content Ingest API Initiative
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: IAB Tech Lab is proposing a framework for publisher compensation through the LLM Content Ingest API Initiative, which aims to address the impact of AI on web economics and brand representation. This initiative will enable brands to control how their content is integrated into LLMs and AI agent services by developing a technical specification. The LLM Content Ingest API intends to give publishers and brands a path forward that is fair, enforceable, and grounded in technical standards.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Asda as £7 Persil laundry liquid slashed to pennies & ‘greedy' people are clearing the shelves
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: ASDA has significantly reduced the prices of various laundry products, including Vanish Oxi Action, Daz Gel, Lenor Fabric Conditioner, Persil Wonder Wash, Surf Detergent Capsules, Eco Egg Laundry Egg Refill Pellets, Fairy Detergent Capsules, and Bold Detergent Capsules. Additionally, smol, a detergent company, shared insights and tips on effective laundry practices.

articles.title: What is a 'Labubu' and why has the $7,000 bug-eyed Chinese toy fuelled so much hype
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Pop Mart sells Labubu, an 'elvish creature', designed by Kasing Lung. Pop Mart licensed Lung's characters into 'blind box' collectibles in 2019. The Monsters is Pop Mart's best-selling franchise, with $419 million in sales last year.

articles.title: Salsify Launches FeedbackIQ to Streamline GDSN with AI
articles.author: SUNshine Girl Miranda
articles.summary: Salsify has launched FeedbackIQ, an AI-powered capability for its Global Data Synchronization Network (GDSN) product. This new feature interprets complex GDSN Confirmation of Information Consistency (CIC) feedback, helping users quickly pinpoint specific attributes and eliminating manual troubleshooting.

articles.title: Salsify Launches FeedbackIQ to Streamline GDSN with AI
articles.author: Salsify
articles.summary: Salsify has launched FeedbackIQ, an AI-powered capability that enhances its Global Data Synchronization Network (GDSN) product. FeedbackIQ helps users pinpoint specific attributes needing attention in product data by interpreting complex GDSN Confirmation of Information Consistency (CIC) feedback. KIND Snack Bars experienced a 10% sales lift after implementing Salsify.

articles.title: Salsify Launches FeedbackIQ to Streamline GDSN with AI
articles.author: Salsify
articles.summary: Salsify launched FeedbackIQ, an AI-powered capability for its Global Data Synchronization Network (GDSN) product. FeedbackIQ interprets complex GDSN Confirmation of Information Consistency (CIC) feedback, helping users pinpoint specific attributes needing attention and speeding up product launches. KIND Snack Bars experienced a 10% sales lift since implementing Salsify.

articles.title: Lock Screen Ads Are Coming to Your Galaxy Phone
articles.author: Corbin Davenport
articles.summary: Samsung is partnering with Glance to introduce 'Glance AI,' a new AI Commerce platform, to the lock screens of Galaxy phones in the United States. This opt-in service, operated by Glance, focuses on shopping by allowing users to upload pictures and view themselves in outfits available for purchase from over 400 brands.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s to launch in India on June 5: How to watch livestream, expected features and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus is set to debut the OnePlus 13s smartphone on June 5, touted as the company's first compact flagship, exclusively for the Indian market. The OnePlus 13s is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and features OnePlus AI features. The smartphone includes a customizable Plus Key for quick access to functions and AI Plus Mind for capturing and retrieving on-screen information.

articles.title: Which compact pickup is better? Edmunds compares the Ford Maverick and Hyundai Santa Cruz
articles.author: Dan Frio
articles.summary: The Ford Maverick offers a fuel-efficient hybrid engine with towing and hauling capabilities, while the Hyundai Santa Cruz provides a more comfortable and SUV-like experience. The Ford Maverick gets an EPA-estimated ab-ad mpg, while the Hyundai Santa Cruz gets a better estimated mileage.

articles.title: Ganga Bath Fittings IPO opens for subscription
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Ganga Bath Fittings launched its Rs 33-crore IPO on Wednesday, priced at Rs 46-49 per equity share, to remain open until June 6. The IPO aims to raise funds for capital expenditure, debt repayment, working capital, and general corporate purposes. Ganga Bath Fittings plans to use the IPO proceeds to invest in modern machinery, improve manufacturing scale, and strengthen its financial foundation.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s Launch On June 5: How To Watch Live Event, Timings, Price Expected And More
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13s, a new phone positioned between the OnePlus 13R and 13 models. The phone's price will be a key factor in its success.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7 launch date specs AI features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the Galaxy Z Fold 7. Galaxy Z Fold 7 promises a game-changing 'Ultra experience'.

articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the Galaxy Z Fold 7. The new Fold promises a 'Ultra experience' that redefines foldable.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra experience teaser
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 7, promising a 'Ultra experience' that redefines foldable phones. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is a new foldable phone from Samsung.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked July 2025 event highlights
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the Galaxy Z Fold 7. The company promises a game-changing 'Ultra experience' that redefines foldable devices.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7 vs Z Fold 6 comparison
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 7. Samsung promises a game-changing 'Ultra experience' that redefines foldable phones.

articles.title: Samarjit Singh forays into Omni-Channel Distribution with Second Venture—Ekaaya Network
articles.summary: Samarjit Singh has launched Ekaaya Network, a new distribution platform. The platform aims to streamline and scale access for emerging consumer brands across modern trade, e-commerce, HORECA, and Q-commerce. Ekaaya Network will focus on import-export facilitation and test marketing of global products in India.

articles.title: The M&S Beauty Bag is back and it's worth £210 - but there's a big change
articles.author: Jade Wright
articles.summary: M&S launched its Summer Beauty Bag 2025, worth £210, for £35, containing skincare, haircare, and fragrance products with four full-sized items and seven travel-sized minis and is exclusively available in-store starting June 5th. The beauty section also includes four new fragrances: Airport Arrival, After Sun Snooze, Cool Blast, and Salty Skin.

articles.title: Philadelphia Cream Cheese Debuts the Bonut, the First-Ever Bagel Donut Featuring New Blueberry and Pineapple Cream Cheese Flavours
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Philadelphia cream cheese, a brand of Kraft Heinz Canada, launched the "Bonut," a bagel donut featuring their new Blueberry and Pineapple cream cheese flavors. This product is a collaboration with bagel shops like College Street Bagels and Fairmont Bagel, and was available for free on National Donut Day and for purchase via Uber Eats for a limited time. The new Philadelphia cream cheese flavors will be available beginning this month in 227g tubs for $4.99 CAD at select retailers nationwide.

articles.title: Philadelphia Cream Cheese Debuts the Bonut, the First-Ever Bagel Donut Featuring New Blueberry and Pineapple Cream Cheese Flavours Français
articles.author: Kraft-Heinz Canada
articles.summary: Philadelphia cream cheese has launched the "Bonut," a bagel donut featuring their new Blueberry and Pineapple cream cheese flavors. They have partnered with College Street Bagels and Fairmont Bagel to give away free Bonuts on June 6, 2025. The new Philadelphia cream cheese flavors will be available beginning this month in 227g tubs for $4.99 CAD at select retailers nationwide.

articles.title: These 34 Products Are Trending On Amazon — And They're Totally Worth The Hype
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Amazon highlights trending products based on sales rank gains, including items like stoneware mugs, rompers, electric toothbrushes, and Owala travel tumblers. The selection includes skincare products like Anua pore-clearing cleansing oil and D'alba Piedmont spray-on serum, as well as beauty and personal care items such as OPI nail polish, hair-building fibers, and Wet n Wild lipstick.

articles.title: Bausch + Lomb Launches Blink® Nourish Lubricating Eye Drops and Blink Boost Lubricating Eye Drops in the United States
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Bausch + Lomb has launched Blink Nourish Lubricating eye drops and Blink Boost Lubricating eye drops in the U.S. These preservative-free, contact-lens friendly products are designed to provide hydration and comfort for dry eyes and are available in multi-dose bottles.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Launch Teaser Revealed: New Ultra Model Coming This Year?
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 models, featuring a thinner design, potentially with Ultra-like features and improved cameras. The new Galaxy S25 Edge is also anticipated, showcasing increased durability with a ceramic-coated screen and titanium frame.

articles.title: Product Bank Announces Launch of New Suite of Digital Efficiency Tools
articles.summary: Product Bank has launched a new suite of digital tools. The suite includes a Unit Converter and Currency Converter to simplify digital tasks for users and businesses. The platform aims to provide accessible and efficient digital solutions without complex software installations.

articles.title: 'How a cooling blanket helped me sleep through a heatwave'
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Oodie has launched a new Cooling Blanket designed to wick away heat and moisture for better sleep. The blanket uses a blend of nylon and elastane, claimed to be three times cooler than cotton, and is currently on sale for £69. Testers found it helped them sleep better during warmer nights.

articles.title: China launches service consumption season--China Economic Net
articles.summary: China launched its national service consumption season in Nanjing on Tuesday. This initiative, co-hosted by the Ministry of Commerce and China Media Group, aims to boost the service sector by cultivating new consumption hotspots and fostering a virtuous cycle between supply and demand.

articles.title: Aldi launches last minute emergency gift service for Father's Day shoppers in Tyne & Wear
articles.author: Habne Miranda
articles.summary: Aldi is launching an 'SOS Service' ahead of Father's Day. This service offers exclusive 'Aldi SOS' gift boxes containing a card, Moser Roth chocolate, and Aldi-themed socks. Aldi also provides various Father's Day gifts in-store, such as a Cast Iron Dutch Oven and a Sisal Dartboard.

articles.title: Aldi launches last minute emergency gift service for Father's Day shoppers in Sussex
articles.author: Habne Miranda
articles.summary: Aldi is launching an 'SOS Service' gift box for Father's Day to aid shoppers who need a last-minute gift. The 'Aldi SOS' gift boxes include a personalized card, Moser Roth chocolate, and Aldi-themed socks. Shoppers can get a box by emailing their name and email address; boxes are distributed on a first-come, first-served basis.

articles.title: Universal API Powers Real-Time Contact Data From Seamless.AI
articles.author: Seamless.AI
articles.summary: A new Universal API is available, allowing users to access and update sales leads without logging into the app directly. This API enriches data by filling in missing information such as titles and firmographics using only a name or email.

articles.title: The AI Music Video Show Partners with Alchemy Streaming
articles.summary: AIMVS LLC partnered with Alchemy Streaming Inc. to launch its curated content service on smart TVs.  The service provides access to various content types, aiming to deliver a personalized and cutting-edge entertainment experience for viewers.

articles.title: Ganga Bath Fittings' ₹33 Crore IPO Opens; Will Remain Open Until June 6
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Ganga Bath Fittings, a manufacturer of bathroom accessories, launched its Rs 33-crore IPO on Wednesday, priced between Rs 46-49 per equity share. The IPO is open for subscription until June 6 and is entirely a fresh issue of 66.63 lakh shares, intended to fuel the company's vision by investing in machinery and strengthening financial foundation.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics teases new foldable smartphone ahead of July unpacking event
articles.author: 김보람
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is teasing its next-generation foldable smartphones, Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, with wider screens and higher-performance cameras. The company will unveil the latest models at its summer Galaxy Unpacked event in July. These new models are expected to feature industry-leading hardware, cutting-edge performance and seamless AI integration optimized for the foldable format.

articles.title: Aldi launches last minute emergency gift service for Father's Day shoppers in Lancashire
articles.author: Habne Miranda
articles.summary: Aldi is launching an 'SOS Service' in Lancashire, offering limited exclusive 'Aldi SOS' gift boxes for Father's Day. The gift boxes include a card, Moser Roth chocolate, and Aldi-themed socks. Aldi also offers a range of Father's Day gifts in stores, such as a Cast Iron Dutch Oven and a Sisal Dartboard.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 review: This affordable smartphone took me by surprise
articles.author: Jon Mundy
articles.summary: Motorola has released the Edge 60, a mid-range smartphone featuring a tough design, bright display, and capable cameras, priced at £379. The device includes a 6.67-inch 'Super HD' display with a 120Hz refresh rate and a peak brightness of 4,500 nits, alongside a 5,200mAh battery with 68W wired charging support. Motorola Edge 60 is one of the most water-resistant phones on the market, with both IP68 and IP69 certification.

articles.title: I'm an analyst by day and a fashion designer by night. A-listers like Zendaya have worn my clothes, but I'm not quitting my 9-5.
articles.author: Claire Turrell
articles.summary: Stephen Goudeau launched a new collection called "Eat Cake" inspired by Marie Antoinette that was featured in New York Fashion Week. In 2025, Stephen Goudeau plans to get into retail and started designing accessories.

articles.title: 21 Shoes That'll Be Comfortable *And* Look Good When You Need To Spend All Day On Your Feet
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Steve Madden introduces sandals comparable to high-end Hermès shoes at an affordable price. Fila releases platform sneakers with extra padding for added height. New Balance presents the 608 V5 Cross Trainers designed for comfort, passing the Disneyland test for blister-free wear. Reebok launches Women's Club C 85 vintage sneakers for subtle statement-making. Allbirds offers wool runners prioritizing comfort and softness.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra Teased With Slimmer Design And AI Features: All You Need To Know
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the launch of a new high-end foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra, expected to be unveiled alongside other foldables. The Ultra model focuses on AI-powered features, a powerful camera, and a design built for flexibility and performance, targeting users who demand larger screens and superior cameras. It is anticipated to be revealed in July 2025.

articles.title: Adobe Photoshop Is Now Available for Android: Here's What You Need To Know
articles.author: Yashraj Verma
articles.summary: Adobe has launched a beta version of Photoshop for Android, bringing mobile editing tools to Google Play. The app is designed for creators on the move and integrates with Adobe's desktop and web platforms, offering features such as advanced selection tools, layer management, and generative AI capabilities. During the beta period, Android users can access all available features at no cost.

articles.title: Samsung Reportedly Eyes Perplexity To Expand Galaxy AI And Revive Bixby
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Perplexity AI could revitalize Samsung's Bixby. This may decrease Samsung's dependence on Google's services.

articles.title: Power Meets Personality: Why POCOs New Phones Are a Vibe Not Just a Device
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: POCO launched two new smartphones, the POCO X7 Pro and POCO C71, in Nigeria. These new devices aim to provide a unique experience in the smartphone market.

articles.title: EE launches new Nintendo Switch 2 gaming bundles
articles.summary: EE has announced new exclusive Nintendo Switch 2 bundles for its pay-monthly mobile customers. These bundles are launching ahead of the global launch of the Nintendo Switch 2 console on June 5th and will be available through EE's online store while supplies last.

articles.title: Samsung announces an ‘Ultra' variant for its next generation of foldable phones

articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to launch its Galaxy Z 7 series, which may include three new folding smartphones, possibly in July.

articles.title: ‘We want to be a challenger in India,' says Dreame India's top executive
articles.author: Sahana Venugopal
articles.summary: Dreame, a consumer electronics company, plans to expand its product range in India beyond robotic vacuum cleaners, including wet-and-dry handle vacuums, robotic pool cleaners, lawn mowers, service robots, and grooming tools. The company also intends to grow its offline presence with product launches and announcements planned for 2025, supplementing its existing online sales.

articles.title: Shoppers race to M&S as new pj bundles spotted – they're super soft, wash well and cheaper than Primark
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
org: UK Shopping For You by Mosheez
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new pyjama range featuring comfortable and stylish sets, including a chilli-patterned design priced at £12.50. These cotton-rich pyjamas come in various colors and patterns, with sizes ranging from extra small to extra extra large, and are available in stores despite ongoing disruptions to online orders due to a cyber attack.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil 'Ultra' foldable in July: What to expect
articles.summary: Samsung is launching a new foldable phone with enhanced AI integration. The new features will allow users to locate restaurants, send messages, and perform work tasks using voice assistance and multitasking capabilities, creating an immersive entertainment hub.

articles.title: McDonald's to launch five new menu items this month – including returning favourite and 'iconic' burger
articles.author: Sam Walker
articles.summary: McDonald's will launch five new menu items this month. These include a returning favourite and a brand new 'iconic' burger.

articles.title: Vivo T4 first look and quick review - Design, performance and cameras! 😍
articles.summary: Vivo T4 is launching with a sleek design, powerful specs, and competitive pricing. The smartphone's performance, design, and camera features are highlights.

articles.title: VDO.AI adds motion to static ads with its innovative In-Scroll Display Ad Format
articles.summary: VDO.AI has launched the In-Scroll Display Ad Format, which combines static imagery with interactive 3D scrolling. This new format, designed for both desktop and mobile, aims to increase user engagement by showcasing product features and calls-to-action. The company states that it is dedicated to innovation and providing cutting-edge solutions.

articles.title: Samsung teases Galaxy Z Fold 7 smartphone, calls it ‘Ultra experience'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its next-generation foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, teased as offering an 'Ultra experience' with improved screens, cameras, and AI capabilities. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to feature an 8.2-inch foldable display, a 6.5-inch cover screen, a thinner design, and faster 45W charging.

articles.title: LTTS and Tennant partner to develop eco-friendly digital products
articles.summary: L&T Technology Services (LTTS) and Tennant Company have partnered to establish an engineering center in India. This center will focus on developing innovative, energy-efficient, and smart cleaning products. These products will utilize advanced technologies like IoT, embedded systems, and automation.

articles.title: VDO.AI launches In-Scroll Display ad format
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: VDO.AI has launched its new 'In-Scroll Display Ad Format,' which is designed to bring motion and interactivity to traditional static ads across desktop and mobile environments. This format features a dynamic 50-50 split design that allows brands to display a static image on one side and an interactive 3D scrolling experience showcasing product features on the other.

articles.title: Samsung teases Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra ahead of July debut (WATCH)
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Samsung is hinting at the launch of a new foldable phone, possibly the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra. The device is expected to feature a larger 8.2-inch folding display and a slimmer design compared to previous models. The actual presentation is anticipated to occur around the second week of July.

articles.title: Samsung announces an ‘Ultra' variant for its next generation of foldable phones
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Samsung announced the upcoming launch of a new foldable smartphone, likely named 'Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra,' along with potential models like Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7, expected in July. The new series will offer an 'Ultra-experience' with bigger screens, better cameras, and AI-driven features designed for the foldable form factor, including voice controls, enhanced messaging, browsing, and gaming capabilities.

articles.title: Next shoppers say they've found the 'perfect' Father's Day gift for £20
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is selling a "Well Groomed Essentials Box" for £20. The box contains seven beauty and toiletries products worth over £77 and is marketed as a Father's Day gift. The grooming products are designed for face, body, and hair.

articles.title: Save £100 off the Amazon Hair Dryer Ionic
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Hair Dryer Ionic for £29.99, a 77% discount from its regular price. The hair dryer features ionic technology, multiple heat and speed settings, and attachments for various styling needs. Customers praise its fast drying capabilities and salon-quality results at a fraction of the cost.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s launching on June 5: Time, how to watch, price and full feature rundown
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch the OnePlus 13s in India on June 5, 2025, featuring the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite CPU and a suite of AI-powered services like AI Best Face 2.0. The OnePlus 13s will be available in Black Velvet, Pink Satin, and Green Silk, with the latter exclusive to India, and it is expected to cost around Rs 55,000.

articles.title: Fresh Del Monte Brings Its Iconic Pinkglow® Pineapple to the UAE, Redefining the Premium Fruit Market
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc. launched Pinkglow® pineapples in the UAE, making them exclusively available on talabat mart for a limited time. The Pinkglow® pineapple, known for its pink flesh and sweetness, will be sold in limited quantities weekly at AED 125, delivered in bespoke packaging.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra With 8.2-Inch Display And Sleek New Design
articles.author: Sofia Babu Chacko
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra, its slimmest foldable smartphone to date, featuring a larger 8.2-inch inner foldable display and camera improvements. It is expected to be officially unveiled in the second week of July 2025 at Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event and may signal a new 'Ultra' branding for Samsung's foldable line.

articles.title: Fresh Del Monte Brings Its Iconic Pinkglow® Pineapple to the UAE, Redefining the Premium Fruit Market
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc. is launching its Pinkglow® pineapple in the United Arab Emirates. The product will be exclusively available for purchase on talabat mart, the quick-commerce arm of talabat, starting June 4.

articles.title: Samsung Teases Galaxy Z Fold 7, Promises ‘Ultra Experience' With Bigger Screen, AI Features, and Enhanced Cameras
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the Galaxy Z Fold 7, highlighting a focus on a larger screen, improved camera, and AI integration. The company is expected to officially launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 at its upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event, likely scheduled for July 2025.

articles.title: Samsung to Unveil Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Fold 7 in July in New York
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will introduce its new foldable phones, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Fold 7, at an Unpacked event in New York City next month. The new phones will feature performance comparable to the Galaxy S Ultra model and AI optimizations for daily tasks. The design of the new Fold also appears less elongated than previous models.

articles.title: Samsung teases new foldable ahead of July unpacking event
articles.author: Indo-Asian News Service
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is preparing to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, the latest models in its foldable smartphone series, at its summer Galaxy Unpacked event in July. The company aims to boost sales with these new models, highlighting advanced artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities and addressing consumer demand for larger screens and enhanced cameras.

articles.title: Shop hyaluronic acid serums now on Myntra's End of Reason Sale (31st May – 12th June)
articles.summary: Hyaluronic acid serums combine hyaluronic acid and niacinamide to hydrate and brighten skin. These serums contain 1.5% pure hyaluronic acid and moisturize skin, making it soft and supple. Additionally, some serums brighten skin with 10% Vitamin C.

articles.title: The All-New Nissan Magnite Makes Its Debut: Elevating Urban Mobility Across Abu Dhabi with Al Masaood Automobiles
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Nissan has launched the all-new Nissan Magnite in the Middle East, starting with its debut in the UAE capital. This marks a significant milestone in Nissan's global strategy.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge survives bend test? WATCH full video here
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge, priced at Rs 1,09,999, has undergone bend and scratch tests, demonstrating its robustness due to its ceramic coating and titanium frame. Despite its slim design and light weight of 163 grammes, the phone proves to be durable, a key selling point for Samsung.

articles.title: SOOK Delivery Launches Thailand's First Vertical Delivery Service
articles.summary: Little John Digital Co., Ltd. has launched 'SOOK Delivery', a vertical delivery service application in Thailand, starting at One Bangkok. This service aims to provide convenience and speed to urban residents and office workers, delivering products directly to different floors within buildings, targeting working professionals and offering deliveries within 15 minutes.

articles.title: Switch 2 – What You Need to Know Before Picking One Up
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Nintendo Switch 2. The pre-launch phase has been characterized by rumors and a lack of official confirmation about the system. The reveal and launch are expected to be brief.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Sales Disappoint
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone with a 5.8 mm thickness. It features a 200 MP primary rear camera, a 12 MP ultra-wide lens, and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset. Galaxy AI integration enhances its photography capabilities.

articles.title: Biggest Questions Notre Dame Must Answer on Defense
articles.summary: WeAreIowa requires users to download the WeAreIowa app to stream content on their phones. The WeAreIowa app enables streaming of WeAreIowa content.

articles.summary: VDO.AI has launched its In-Scroll Display Ad Format, a new advertising product designed to bring motion and interactivity to traditional static ads. The format features a dynamic 50-50 split design, enabling brands to display static images alongside interactive product features, with the goal of improving user engagement.

articles.title: 25 Target Must-Haves For Busy Parents
articles.author: Raylyn Paquin
articles.summary: The content highlights several new and updated products for parents and children. These include the Infantino wrist rattles, Munchkin faucet extenders, Jool Baby travel potty seat, Ubbi grape cutter, Shark handheld vacuum, Skylight calendar, Bissell vacuum/mop combo etc, and are designed to simplify parenting tasks, enhance child independence, and promote organization.

articles.title: The Lexicon announces opening date of new lifestyle brand
articles.author: Nicole Mcbride
articles.summary: Newbie, a brand under the Kappahl Group, is expanding and will open a new store in Bracknell on The Avenue. This launch is part of the brand's growth strategy, aiming to meet increased demand and create inspiring in-store experiences.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 beginner's guide – should you buy it day one?
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 console, which is a hybrid console like the original Switch but with enhanced features. The Switch 2 is more powerful, allowing for faster games and better graphics, and includes new functionalities such as GameChat.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s Price, Launch Date And Time In India, Availability, Color Options, Specs, And More: All You Need To Know
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13s in India on June 5th, featuring premium specs and AI features. The smartphone will be available in Black Velvet, Pink Satin, and Green Silk, and is expected to include a 6.32-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and a 6,260mAh battery with 90W fast charging.

articles.title: டீசல் இன்ஜினுடன் பனோரமிக் சன்ரூஃப்.. குறைவான விலையிலேயே பெட்ரோல்-DCT காம்போ.. ஹூண்டாய் அல்கஸார் புதிய வேரியன்ட்கள் வெளியானது

articles.title: Samsung announces Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra and here is what it looks like: Full details
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra, featuring a larger 6.5-inch cover screen and an 8.2-inch foldable display. The new foldable is expected to be unveiled in July and may have a thinner design compared to its predecessor, though the battery capacity is expected to remain unchanged at 4,400 mAh.

articles.title: The All-New Nissan Magnite Makes Its Debut: Elevating Urban Mobility Across Abu Dhabi with Al Masaood Automobiles
articles.summary: Al Masaood Automobiles, the authorized Nissan dealer, has launched the all-new Nissan Magnite compact SUV in Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, and the Western Region. The Magnite features a turbocharged 1.0-litre engine, advanced safety features, and an 8-inch touchscreen infotainment system with wireless Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™ integration.

articles.title: Google AI Mode: Tread with caution, verify information carefully, and always check answers
articles.author: Brian X. Chen
articles.summary: Google is introducing AI Mode, a new tool similar to chatbots like ChatGPT and Gemini, as a tab next to Google.com search results. AI Mode stitches together data from Google's services to answer queries and is intended to redefine online search by allowing users to ask specific questions and make complex requests. While traditional Google search is better for finding things nearby, AI Mode has potential for product research.

articles.title: Coca-Cola Unveils 60cl Bottle, Assures Consumers of more refreshment
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: Coca-Cola Nigeria has launched a new 60cl bottle designed to offer consumers more refreshment for the same price. This new size is also available for Fanta and Sprite and is available nationwide. The company aims to provide more value and meaningful experiences with this launch.

articles.title: Subaru teases what could be a new WRX
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Subaru has released a teaser image of a new model scheduled to be revealed in October. The model is speculated to be either an all-new WRX or a higher-performance version of the current WRX or Levorg (WRX Sportswagon).

articles.title: Best fully automatic washing machines you should not miss: Top 10 options from Samsung, LG and more
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: The article highlights several new fully automatic washing machines from companies like Samsung, Whirlpool, LG, and Panasonic. These models include features such as Eco Bubble technology (Samsung), Magic Clean technology (Whirlpool), AI Direct Drive (LG), and active foam wash (Panasonic). The machines vary in capacity, spin speed, and energy efficiency, with models designed for small to large families.

articles.title: Technocity unveils Lenovo Evolve'25 featuring AMD's ground-breaking Krackan Point APU
articles.summary: Lenovo, in partnership with Technocity, launched a range of AI-powered solutions in Sri Lanka, including Lenovo Yoga, Slim 5, Slim 5 2-in-1 laptops, as well as AI-powered desktops and monitors. These products are equipped with AMD's Krackan Point AI APUs and are designed for consumers, businesses, and creators, offering enhanced performance and intelligent features.

articles.title: 31 Beauty Products That'll Help With Upkeep Without Costing A Fortune
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Cosrx introduces Snail Mucin Power Essence for skin rejuvenation. OGX launches Argan Oil of Morocco Curl-Defining Cream for soft, shiny curls. Skin1004 releases pore-tightening masks with immediate results. CeraVe offers salicylic acid body wash for keratosis pilaris. VieBeauti presents eyelash growth serum for longer, stronger lashes. L'Oréal launches Wonder Water Lamellar Hair Treatment for shiny hair. Fanola introduces "No Yellow" purple shampoo for blonde hair. Etude House releases SPF 50 sun milk for lightweight sun protection. First Aid Beauty launches KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant for smooth skin. Elizavecca introduces a hair treatment infused with collagen, ceramides, and protein extracts to help repair damaged hair. O'Keeffe's introduces hypoallergenic hand cream to restore moisture to dry, cracked, and sensitive skin.

articles.title: Samsung Teases Ultra-Grade Foldable Phone With a 'Powerful Camera,' AI Tools
articles.author: Abrar Al-Heeti
articles.summary: Samsung plans to launch a new Galaxy Fold this summer, incorporating an 'Ultra-experience' into a more portable design. This new foldable will feature a powerful camera and AI-powered tools. Speculations arise if its camera will match the S25 Ultra's 200-megapixel main camera.

articles.title: How Dyson's ‘Problem-First' Mindset Keeps it Ahead of the Game
articles.author: Dean Blake
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the PencilVac, a vacuum integrated into a broom, representing the company's focus on solving everyday problems. The PencilVac utilizes a miniaturized version of the V9 motor, also used in Dyson's SuperSonic hair dryers, and features a slim design for ease of use. Sir James Dyson acknowledges the risk involved in launching new products but emphasizes the company's commitment to solving problems and improving usability.

articles.title: Woke Is Not Dead - Fandom Pulse Daily Briefing
articles.author: Fandom Pulse
articles.summary: Nintendo anticipates its upcoming console, Nintendo Switch 2, to be sold out at retailers following its launch later this week. The console's anticipated launch and potential for rapid sell-out highlights the significance of this new product introduction for Nintendo.

articles.title: Tradift's AI-powered tool eliminate digital barriers for SMEs, builds e-commerce stores in seconds
articles.author: Juliet Umeh
articles.summary: Tradift, a Nigerian SaaS platform, has launched an AI-powered feature that allows users to create fully personalized e-commerce stores within seconds by describing their requirements. The new AI tool personalizes each store based on business type, audience, and regional preferences across African markets. The company aims to democratize digital access for small and medium businesses across Africa.

articles.title: Nike has its iconic Dunk sneakers on sale up to $60 off
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Nike is having a sale on Nike Dunk sneakers. Customers who want to purchase Nike Dunk sneakers can purchase them at discounted price.

articles.title: Shuug Is The Middle Eastern Hot Sauce The Condiment Aisle Has Been Craving
articles.author: Andrew Watman
articles.summary: Shuug launched its second hot sauce variety, a harissa, in Spring 2024. The company is planning to release a third sauce in 2025, expanding its line of family recipe hot sauces.

articles.title: Generative AI Rewriting The Rules Of Retail
articles.author: Jill Standish
articles.summary: Accenture's Consumer Pulse Survey 2025 shows that consumers are increasingly trusting AI for purchase advice, driving brands to engage with the AI ecosystem. Retailers can embed branded, AI-powered advisors into their channels to provide tailored product recommendations and improve the in-store experience by equipping staff with AI copilots for personalized customer engagement.

articles.title: Picking A Franchise: 5 Questions Every Future Franchisee Should Ask
articles.summary: Rolling Suds, a power-washing franchise, offers a franchise opportunity with training covering hiring and local marketing. They emphasize support for franchisees in customer acquisition and problem-solving. Rolling Suds is seeking franchisees to work in their exterior cleaning services.

articles.title: Switch 2 Launch Day: Everything Happening As Fans Finally Go Hands-On With Nintendo's New Console
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: Nintendo's Switch 2, a successor to the original Switch, has launched on June 5. The console includes important features and updates.

articles.title: DripTock App Revolutionizes Daily Style with AI-Powered Outfit Inspiration and Social Fashion Community
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Rush Link Computers LLC launched DripTock, an AI-powered mobile app, on June 4, 2025. The app is designed for users to discover, create, and share outfit ideas and is available on both Google Play and the App Store.

articles.title: Kodiak Cakes adding new products
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company has launched new products including bars and frozen breakfast sandwiches. This introduction expands their product offerings in the food sector.

articles.title: Yard Boyz Lawn Care Launches in Atlanta, Delivering Top-Tier Lawn Care and Junk Removal with ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Yard Boyz officially launched in Atlanta, providing premium lawn care and efficient junk removal services. The company aims to set a new standard for professionalism, responsiveness, and reliability with its services.

articles.title: Makita tools with technical support and fast delivery from Mister Worker®
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A digital platform featuring over 250,000 products for industrial sectors, offers a comprehensive selection for maintenance, repair and operations. The online store caters to professionals seeking efficient technical solutions.

articles.title: Talenti gelato jars are notoriously hard to open, so the brand is working on a fix
articles.author: NBC Bay Area
articles.summary: Talenti is responding to customer complaints regarding the difficulty of opening their ice cream jars. The brand is listening to frustrated customers who have expressed online their struggle to access the ice cream.

articles.title: Samsung Vs. LG: Which TV Brand Is Best?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung and LG TVs possess distinct features that consumers should consider when making a purchase decision. The article aims to help consumers evaluate the unique offerings of each brand's television products.

articles.title: Website Design For Startups And Small Businesses In New Zealand
articles.summary: Ultimate Web Designs provides website design services tailored for startups, including custom design, responsive layouts, and e-commerce functionality. They offer SEO optimization and Google Ads campaigns to drive traffic and support startup growth, providing a suite of services to assist startups in establishing and expanding their online presence.

articles.title: Adobe Photoshop app finally lands on Android with Generative AI, layering and video features
articles.author: Atreyee Poddar
articles.summary: Adobe launched the full-fledged Photoshop app for Android phones, providing access to professional-level photo-editing tools including layering, masking, and Firefly-powered Generative Fill. The app includes features like combining photos into looping videos and supports b-roll generation, catering to content creators.

articles.title: TikTok Adds AI-Powered Tools To Woo Marketers Ahead Of Potential Ban
articles.author: Staff Report
articles.summary: TikTok introduced new ad products, including a Search Ads Center within Ads Manager, at its World Summit. The new offering addresses increased search activity on the platform, where a significant portion of users initiate searches shortly after opening the app. This launch aims to cater to performance advertisers.
